landing.bio: I am a passionate person about technology, i have three professional degrees in colombia related to systems engineering and student in training for full stack developer at holberton School Bogotá. My tech stack includes Python with Odoo ERP, Sql, Html, Css and Javascript, System POS with Oracle Simphony (before Micros). I manage agile methodologies in software projects, Cloud services in AWS, Digital Ocean, versioning control with git and containers with Docker.

experience.position: Data Processing Operator (DPO) and IMDB (Data Base)
experience.aboutWork: Responsible for organize and process the databases to deliver to the client. Testing new software to release production
Manage and parameterize document management software. Provide support, train staff, run tests, raise requirements and document the application process (User's Manual guide)

experience.position: POS consultant (Oracle Simphony) and ERP with Odoo Community
experience.aboutWork: Improve and develop custom modules for Odoo versions 8-10. Deploy software on cloud services and On premise, manage data bases, provide support and customize views according to customer requirements

experience.position: Lead Implementation and development for Odoo ERP version 9 and 10 Community Edition.
experience.aboutWork: Model business processes, develop and customize modules, raise requirements, provide support and manage cloud services

interests.paragraphOne: Improve skills and learn new technology frameworks, programming languages, AI, machine learning and other tools.
interests.paragraphTwo: I like to colaborate in Tech projects, make a great team, learn english and french languages and in my free time, i like to play soccer.

awards.awardDetail: Mention given to good results and positive value to the company / The Nielsen Company Colombia
